item.title: What the L.A. Protests Mean for Small Businesses and the Economy
item.description: An expert on American labor history lays out what needs to happen to avoid a recession as the government pushes for mass deportations.

item.title: What to Say to Employees Who Take More Than Their Share of Free Food
item.description: Some employees take so much food at company events that none is left for clients. Here’s how to handle it.

item.title: Warren Buffett’s Best Advice on How to Be Successful? Science Says He’s Right
item.description: According to Buffett, birds of a feather should want to flock together.

item.title: The Fed Is Bracing for Tariffs to Show Up in the Inflation Data
item.description: Trump keeps calling for Fed rate cuts but the trade war complicates matters.

item.title: After 31 Years, McDonald’s Just Got Some Very Rough News
item.description: Of course, I don’t mean to say McDonald’s is going away …
